about.title: What is Jingle Will
about.intro: Jingle Will (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. is a fintech company focused on overseas markets, dedicated to providing convenient, secure, and user-friendly inclusive financial services to users in developing countries worldwide through leading big data, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence technologies.
about.history: Since its establishment in 2020, Jingle Will has continuously expanded its global business, rapidly achieving a leading position in multiple markets:

milestones.2021: In 2021, entered Mexico and secured a top-three position in the industry;
milestones.2022: In 2022, entered Colombia, where our app business captured a significant market share; launched the Peru project in the same year, ranking in the top five;
milestones.2023: In 2023, officially launched in the Pakistan market and quickly rose to first place; entered Chile at the end of the year, showing continuous growth;
milestones.2025: In 2025, expanded business to Indonesia, entering the top five in the industry; in September of the same year, launched in the Kenyan market;
milestones.future: We will also expand into more countries and regions such as Thailand, Egypt, India, and Ecuador.

about.compliance: We place great importance on compliance and brand building. With comprehensive qualifications in Latin America and Southeast Asia, we are recognized as a benchmark for compliance in the region.
about.team: Jingle Will has branches in Beijing, Chengdu, Hong Kong, and 8 overseas countries, with a team of 3,000 people. We value talent and continuously create an international development platform and diverse promotion channels for our employees. Outstanding talents have opportunities for exchange and work in Latin America, Southeast Asia, and other regions.
about.closing: We continue to expand our global business footprint at a pace of one new market per year. If you are eager to participate in technological innovation and embrace global opportunities, welcome to join Jingle Will to grow with us and create the future together!

technology.title: Using AI to Bring Precise Change to the World
technology.titlePart1: Using AI to Bring the World
technology.subtitle: Smart Intelligent Risk Control and Digital Solutions
technology.description: Our technology is quietly driving change:
technology.intro1: We are Jingle Will, a global AI fintech company born in Beijing. Leveraging big data and AI technology, we provide smart intelligent risk control and digital solutions for emerging markets in Latin America, Southeast Asia, and Africa.
technology.intro2: Based in Beijing and Chengdu, with a presence in 7 major global capitals. We are both 'Tech Visionaries' and 'Financial Pragmatists,' continuously bringing smart, inclusive services to every corner of the world.
technology.cta: Jingle Will, waiting for you to join >

impact.description: Using algorithms, we have provided millions of users with their first-ever reliable digital credit service, making 'unserviceable' a thing of the past.
impact.growthDesc: Our intelligent system has become a powerful tool for partners entering new global markets, doubling operational efficiency and risk control capabilities.
impact.partnerDesc: Adhering to a 'Global Vision, Local Precision.' We delve deep into Mexico, Jakarta, Islamabad... strictly adhering to local compliance to build long-term trust in global markets.

homepage.saasTitle: Global SaaS Platform, Opening a New Chapter in Efficient Operations
homepage.saasDescription: The Jingle Will Cloud Platform supports multiple languages and end-to-end business management, making your financial operations more controllable, efficient, and precise in the global market.
homepage.saasIntegrationDesc: Integrates multi-dimensional tools like data analysis, smart outreach, and third-party risk control. Empowered by big data AI, it achieves integrated management of marketing, customer relations, and performance, effectively reducing risks and comprehensively improving operational efficiency.
homepage.adsTitle: Precise Advertising, Connecting with Global Users
homepage.adsDescription: Covering mainstream media resources worldwide, combined with third-party tracking and anti-fraud tools, we provide high-conversion, precisely targeted global advertising services for your product.
homepage.adsTargetingDesc: Supports multi-dimensional targeting by country, device, browser, time, and interest to accurately filter audiences, effectively increasing ROI and making every penny of your budget count.
homepage.adsCreativeDesc: From ad creative planning and material production to DSP channel delivery, we provide performance marketing solutions like CPI, CPA, and CPS to help products quickly reach the global market.
homepage.riskTitle: Intelligent Risk Control, Safeguarding Business Security
homepage.riskDescription: Integrates a multi-dimensional data risk control system to provide real-time risk assessment and warning services, helping enterprises effectively identify fraudulent behavior and build a secure and trustworthy business environment.
homepage.riskMonitoringDesc: Combines multi-dimensional data such as device fingerprinting, behavioral analysis, and credit assessment to identify abnormal transactions and fraud risks in real-time, providing intelligent risk warnings and decision support.
homepage.riskDecisionDesc: Integrates multi-source data like third-party credit bureaus and blacklists, continuously optimizing risk control strategies through machine learning models to provide a solid guarantee for business growth.

saas.title: SaaS Platform Services
saas.description: The Jinguo SaaS Cloud Platform is a multi-language, end-to-end software system designed for risk control enterprises to conduct financial business. By integrating various intelligent tools, data, SMS outreach, voice calls, and third-party risk control, it makes business operations controllable, efficient, convenient, and precise. The system integrates marketing, customer, and employee performance management, and uses big data analysis to connect with AI, reducing customer risk and improving management levels.

innovation.title: Multi-language, End-to-End Business Support
innovation.description: Provides a multi-language, end-to-end system to help risk control enterprises conduct financial business, achieving controllable and efficient operations.

tool.title: Multi-dimensional Intelligent Tool Integration
tool.description: Integrates data, SMS, voice calls, and third-party risk control to promote convenient and precise business operations.

management.title: Integrated Management of Marketing, Customers, and Performance
management.description: Merges marketing, customer, and employee performance management, relying on big data to optimize operations.

ai.title: Big Data AI Empowers Risk Control Enhancement
ai.description: Connects with AI through big data analysis to reduce customer risk and enhance enterprise management levels.

ads.title: Media Channel Advertising Services
ads.description: We can place client ads in multiple countries and regions worldwide, covering major global app and website media resources. Combined with third-party tracking statistics and anti-fraud traffic tools, we help clients rapidly promote their products or services globally, providing high-conversion and precise media advertising services.

keyword.title: Keyword Targeting
keyword.description: Place ads based on keywords; ads will only be displayed on media relevant to those keywords.

country.title: Country Targeting
country.description: Target specific countries and regions to precisely filter the audience, thereby increasing return on investment.

device.title: Device Targeting
device.description: Deliver ads to various devices, including Android, iOS, PC, and Smart TVs.

browser.title: Browser Targeting
browser.description: Create specific visitor and exclusion lists to push ads to particular users.

time.title: Time Targeting
time.description: Select specific delivery periods, either certain times of the day or specific days of the week.

fun.title: Interest Targeting
fun.description: Show ads only to users who are interested in the product or service.

riskControl.title: Intelligent Risk Control Data Services
riskControl.description: Based on our mastery of risk control business and research into big data technology, we have developed a comprehensive intelligent risk control data service system. This system, designed to expand into anti-fraud and anti-money laundering scenarios, includes a lightweight and scalable built-in risk control model that effectively meets risk control needs under various business growth conditions. Data services include the integration of internal and external data, processing of risk indicators, risk control strategy services, and risk monitoring. On the tool level, it supports the integration of commercial tools and the development of proprietary tools.

innovation.title: Continuous Enrichment and Improvement of Innovative Solutions
innovation.description: Continuously improve model scenarios and label libraries according to market developments to maintain the innovation and advancement of our data services.

consulting.title: Integrated Consulting and Implementation Services
consulting.description: With a professional consulting team, feasible implementation plans, and mature products, we provide professional, integrated consulting and implementation services.

platform.title: Applicable to Various Basic Platforms
platform.description: Suitable for various basic platforms, such as traditional MPP platforms, Hadoop platforms, cloud platforms, etc.

management.title: End-to-End Closed-Loop Risk Control Management Solution
management.description: End-to-end risk control data services covering the entire lifecycle of the client's product.

section1.title: Dare to Join Us and Redefine Global Fintech?
section1.description: Jingle Will - A rapidly expanding global 'Tech+Finance' powerhouse, recruiting the strongest teammates

section2.title: Breaking Traditional Boundaries, Building a Global Fintech Arena
section2.description: AI-powered risk control, waiting for you to join the team
section2.content: We're not a traditional financial company or an old-school tech factory. We are Jingle Will, the perfect combination of 'Tech Innovation' and 'Financial Execution'! We deconstruct finance with code, reshape risk control with AI, and dominate global markets. Now, we've built dual-engine headquarters in Beijing and Chengdu, and lit up the map at 7 global battlefields including Mexico City, Jakarta, and Islamabad.
section2.contentFooter: Over 3,000 top talents have assembled globally. Next step? We're waiting for you!

section3.title: This 'Instance' Experience is Maxed Out
section3.description: Team up to unlock global fintech challenges
section3.part1Description: Your code, strategies, and products will be deployed directly on the frontlines of emerging markets like Mexico, Pakistan, and Kenya. You're not just workingâyou're providing millions of users with unprecedented financial services. That sense of achievement? Top-tier!
section3.part2Description: Business doubles every year, new markets every year. This means your growth rate must keep up with our expansion speed! Here, there's no ceilingâonly challenges and opportunities you can't imagine.
section3.part3Description: Worried about outdated tech? Not here! Big data, cloud computing, and AI models are our standard configuration. Here, you can freely leverage top resources and turn your wildest ideas into reality.
section3.part4Description: We care about your ideas, not your title. Whether in Beijing, Chengdu, or Mexico offices, we advocate for direct, open, and collaborative atmosphere. Your voice matters.
